item.description:
Hello Coffee Talkers,

Thought we would enjoy a simple yet delicous cup of coffee and great breakfast and everyday sweet treats at Dunkin Donuts.  Would you be interested in joining us for coffee and sweet treats, not to mention great conversation on this lovely late Saturday afternoon/early evening in April at Dunkin Donuts?  Classic and simple, one can even say romantic, let's hang out this Saturday night and spend some time togther at Dunkin Donuts.  Let's catch up, talk about our favorite coffee and delicious sweet treat at one of America's favorites...."America runs on Dunkin".

http://www.mystore411.com/store/view/496571/Dunkin'-Donuts-Hamden

www.mystore411.com/store/view/496571/Dunkin'-Donuts-Hamden

*** Swadhi's personal Dunkin Donut favorites.....

- Small Raspberry Coffee & Sausage Egg and Cheese on an English Muffin

- Small Coconut Coffee & their Chocolate Glazed Donut (Raspberry Coffee works too)

- Small Raspberry or Coconut Coffee & their delicious Chocolate Chip Cookie (Very Soft, Very Delicious with BIG chocolate chips) :)

- White Hot Chocolate

- Not last or least, their Pumpkin Spice Coffee, only seasonal but truly delicious!

Coffee Talkers - I would like each and every one of you to share your personal favorites at Dunkin Donuts. :)

Looking forward to seeing you there.

Cheers,

Swadhi & Mike

 

I will be leaving around 6:30 p m to go to see the movie, "The Host" in

North Haven.  If the rest of you are enjoying yourselves, then you can stay

and continue having coffee and conversation.  Mike
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes. I will have my Purple Backpack.
item.name: Coffee Talk goes to Hamden Dunkin Donuts.
